name: Stay Safe (itch) (AK-97)
description:
Stay Safe is a fun endless running game where you have to help an emoji who forgot to put on his mask to stay safe.

so first: always remember to wear a mask and respect social distance to Stay Safe :)

second: this is the first game we ever made so we will be very happy if you suport us by  giving us your feedback.

upcoming Features:

  • more animations and funny reactions
  • new characters with new maps and funny stories

this game is made by leetBrothers team for the Ready Player 42 game jam.
